dmp.title: DMP for REBIPP Plant-Pollinator Interaction Dataset
dmp.description: This Data Management Plan describes the management, sharing, and preservation of data generated by the REBIPP project on pollinator-plant interactions in Brazil. The dataset contributes to the WorldFAIR WP10 Plant-Pollinator case study and is hosted on Zenodo and indexed by GloBI. The data follow FAIR principles and Darwin Core metadata standards.

contributor.name: REBIPP - Brazilian Network of Plant-Pollinator Interactions

dataset.title: Pollinator-Plant Interactions from the REBIPP Project, Brazil
dataset.description: A dataset documenting interactions between pollinators and plants across various biomes in Brazil. It includes taxonomic classification, location metadata, interaction type, and bibliographic provenance. Published on Zenodo and indexed by GloBI under WorldFAIR WP10.
data_quality_assurance: Taxonomic names resolved using standardized vocabularies
Metadata reviewed for Darwin Core compliance
Dataset undergoes validation via GloBI integration pipeline

technical_resources: GloBI indexing and metadata resolution system

metadata.description: Used to describe biodiversity and biotic interaction data (e.g., taxonID, occurrenceID, interactionType)

dmp.preservation_statement: The dataset will be preserved indefinitely on Zenodo using CERN-backed long-term storage with persistent identifiers (DOIs). GloBI continuously indexes and mirrors metadata for discoverability.
